game.title: The Lost Scrolls
game.objective: Find and retrieve the lost scrolls
game.description: Ancient scrolls holding forbidden knowledge were stolen by the dark wizard. Locate the dark wizard's den, find the scrolls, and return them to High Mage Erendil.

task.description: Follow the trail of dark magic to reach the wizard's den. Beware of traps and creatures.
Fight the dark wizard or his minions to secure the scrolls. Avoid losing them.
Deliver the scrolls to the castle and be prepared for any encounters. The high mage awaits.
